thread.title: Q4[MP]::The Chill Runs Deep _ Competitive Instinct

post.author: phantazm11
post.body:
Hey,

I noticed that I somehow forgot to post two of my finished maps on this site. Some of you may have already seen them on my website, but for the ones who have not, here are a couple of screenshots. The links below lead to more information about the maps and the downloads:

Competitive Instinct: A Q4 DM, Tourney map set inside a futuristic sports arena



Download Competitive Instinct

The Chill Runs Deep: A Q4 DM, Tourney, TDM map set in a frozen, underground laboratory



Download The Chill Runs Deep
